class.name: AOBakeableMeshInstance
class.brief_description: A specialized MeshInstance3D that can bake ambient occlusion data.
class.description: AOBakeableMeshInstance extends MeshInstance3D to provide ambient occlusion baking functionality. It allows you to bake ambient occlusion data directly onto meshes, providing better visual quality and performance compared to real-time ambient occlusion.

method.name: get_debug_vertex
method.description: Returns the currently selected debug vertex index. Used for debugging the ambient occlusion baking process.

method.name: set_debug_vertex
method.description: Sets the debug vertex index to [param v]. This allows inspection of specific vertices during the ambient occlusion baking process.

members.member: If [code]true[/code], automatically updates the mesh after baking ambient occlusion.
The mesh containing the baked ambient occlusion data.
The color of the environment light used in ambient occlusion calculations.
The maximum angle in degrees used to determine if a surface point is occluded.
The color applied to occluded areas.
The maximum distance to check for occlusion during the baking process.
